short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Organize all of your favorite creators from Patreon in one place. Filter, search & download your media avoiding duplicate downloads.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension helps you maintain all of your favorite creators from Patreon in one place. Stop endless scrolling to find files. Get a clear picture of what's going on in all posts and keep your subscribed content away from Patreon's sea of scattered files. Turn your purchased assets into a navigable ocean of order, making every media effortlessly accessible despite the initial chaos. Filter, search and manage your media avoiding duplicate downloads. Bulk download files and keep track of your progress. Ensuring your data is properly arranged, you no longer have to race against the clock to receive your files before the next subscription renewal. Never miss a file again. Get the extension and let the software do the work for you.

How to Use
1. Sign in to your patreon.com account
2. Subscribe to a patreon.com creator
3. Sign in to the browser extension within the browser
4. Visit the patreon.com creator's home page
5. Click the browser extension (Home tab) and wait until the creator is detected
6. The "Downloads page" button will appear. Click it and you will be transferred to the files management page where all the available files from the creator will appear. It isn't required to have the patreon.com page opened in your browser.
